interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Iryasa Under Eye Oil - Dark Circles Under Eye Treatment - Natural Anti Aging Serum for Under Eye Bags Treatment, Puffy Eyes Treatment, Eye Lifting and Firming - Eye Serum for Men & Women - 0.27 fl oz
Review Date: 2020/05/05
Store: IRYASA
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Eye Treatment,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'IRYASA', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.79 x 0.79 x 3.43 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: (Reviewed by my wife): I love the roller applicator of this under eye treatment.  It makes applying the product very easy and helps avoid wasting product.  The eye treatment smells great and goes on smooth.  It moisturizes well and leaves a little shine, reducing the appearance of dark circles and lines.  It is not a miracle product, however, and it does not get rid of really dark circles like the ones I have around my eyes.
Review Title: Love the roller applicator
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Body Scrubs for Women Premium Organic Nimiah Exfoliating Body Scrub with Activated Bamboo Charcoal Natural Salt Exfoliator Scrubs for Body Foot Hand Skin Care Nimiah {'Brand': 'Nimiah', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Use for': 'Hands, Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '2.7 x 2.7 x 2.1 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242919810'} Pros:

*The scrub is really good at exfoliating skin;
*After a week of daily use of this scrub, my skin is noticeably softer and brighter;
*It is kind of fun to use because it feels/looks like you are rubbing dirt all over your body;
*The jar is small but a little goes a long way.

Cons:
*The charcoal scrub is a bit messy if you are not careful. I have to quickly rinse my shower after each use because the stuff has flicked everywhere. Great scrub Way Of Will Sweet Orange Body Wash, Moisturizing Body Wash with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Body Wash for Women and Men, Paraben and Sulfate Free, 120 mL Way Of Will {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Oily,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'Way Of Will', 'Scent': 'Sweet Orange', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben,Sulfate Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '840652000191'} (Reviewed by my wife): I did not expect to like this sweet orange essential oil body wash (It's orange!). It smells heavenly. The scent is a mood lifter as described. The body wash leaves my skin soft and smooth.

The bottle is surprisingly small, but a little goes a long way. Orange scent is heavenly Splendora Sugar Lip Scrub - Peach - (20g / 0.7oz.) Splendora {'Brand': 'Splendora', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '1.73 x 1.73 x 1.34 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '736640550444'} (Reviewed by my wife): This lip scrub smells great and tastes great. You are supposed to rinse off the scrub after rubbing it in, but it tasted so good that I found myself licking the peachy sugar off. The directions are very simple, just put a bit of scrub on your lips and rub them in for about 30 seconds, then rinse off. My lips are visibly smoother after using this product. The jar is small, but a little goes a long way so I'll be making this last. Smells great, tastes great Lip MOISTURIZER by MERLOTSPF15 - Intense Therapy Lip Moisturizer - Grape Seed Infused - for Healing Dry, Chapped Lips. Made with Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E - Color FreeSPF 15 Merlot {'Package Dimensions': '2.71 x 1.57 x 0.59 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} This is a very nice lip moisturizer. It goes on clear and softens and moisturizes your lips. There is no scent or flavoring. The moisturizer provides sun protection. Leaves lips soft and protected from the sun Taya Beauty Inner Core Hair Strong Anti-Breakage Shampoo & Conditioner Duo - Strengthening and Repairing Formula - Free From Sulfates and Parabens - 8 fl oz Bottles TAYA I AM. ['INNER CORE SHAMPOO: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Panthenol, Dimethicone, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-11, Laureth-4, Laureth-23, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Amodimethicone, Cocamide MIPA, Trideceth-12, Kaolin, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Coconut Acid, Sodium Methyltaurate, Isopropanolamine, Tocopherol, Salicylic Acid, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool. INNER CORE CONDITIONER: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Polysorbate 60, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Polyquaternium-37, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-7, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Cetyl Alcohol, Trideceth-12, C11-15 Pareth-7, C12-13 Pareth-23, C12-13 Pareth-3, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-90M, Tetrasodium EDTA, Buteth-3, C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Laureth-9, Tributyl Citrate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Kaolin, Yellow 6/CI 15985, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Oleate, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, C10-11 Isoparaffin, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trisodium HEDTA, Silica, BHT, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool.'] {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Repairing,Cleanses,Breakage', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'TAYA I AM.', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Color Treated, Curly, Damaged, Thin', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.53 x 2.09 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '3.00', 'UPC': '858308002185'} I was able to get the conditioner bottle open, but not the shampoo. The bottles have an interesting opening mechanism. You turn the top and squeeze the product out through a mesh hole on the top. Unfortunately, the top on our shampoo bottle is defective and none of us can get it open. The conditioner is very nice though. It is thick and smooth and detangles well. It also smells nice. Shampoo bottle won't open Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm - Set of 2, 0.25oz - Nourishing Herbal Lip Elixir with 100% Natural and Certified Organic Ingredients Pharmacopia {'Brand': 'Pharmacopia', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Soothing,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 1.7 x 0.7 inches; 0.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '087819800366'} This product is way better than traditional Chapstick. It is very moisturizing and non-waxy. It leaves my lips soft and smooth. The dry lip relief lasts longer than Chapstick. The tangerine scent is heavenly. Way better than Chapstick C.O. Bigelow Shampoo, Lavender Peppermint Shampoo Cleanses & Soothes Hair & Scalp, Luxury Shampoo for Men & Women, 10.4 Fl Oz. C. O. Bigelow {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Liquid,Gel', 'Scent': 'Fresh,Lavender,Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '815691009023'} What I like about this product:
*It smells fantastic with the perfect blend of peppermint and lavender. The scent is not overpowering like some peppermint shampoos I've tried;
*It lathers really well.
*It leaves my hair feeling and looking shiny and clean.

What I don't like about the product:
*The bottle is relatively small for the price ($18.00 for 10.14 ounces at the time of this review);
*The cap broke off after the first use. Smells great and lathers well 13.5 fl. Oz. Goat Milk Facial Cleanser, Moisturizing Face Wash for Women, Hydrating Natural Face Wash, Anti-aging Face Wash, Face Wash for Aging Ski L&I Apothecary {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'L&I Apothecary', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 4.25 x 4.13 inches; 1.38 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'LI-BB', 'UPC': '781490943212', 'Manufacturer': 'The Henna Guys, Inc.'} (Reviewed by my wife): This is a very interesting cleanser - I've never tried anything like it. It does not foam/lather at all. Instead, it is so thick it has the consistency of lotion. It is gentle but cleans effectively. It leaves my skin feeling clean and soft. Thick and gentle Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle WORKMAN'S FRIEND {'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.5 x 2.3 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'UPC': '023857030709'} This is a great, complete hand hair set for anyone with dry, cracked hands. It would make a good gift.

*The charcoal scrub is very gritty so it's good for getting dirt out of the cracks on your hands.
*The barrier cream is helpful for prevention of dry hands (stop it before it even starts).
*Both the barrier cream and the hand cream have the nice side effect of reducing the appearance of wrinkles/aging on your hands.
*The products are gentle and excellent quality.
*A little goes a long way. Awesome products Iryasa Under Eye Oil - Dark Circles Under Eye Treatment - Natural Anti Aging Serum for Under Eye Bags Treatment, Puffy Eyes Treatment, Eye Lifting and Firming - Eye Serum for Men & Women - 0.27 fl oz IRYASA {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Eye Treatment,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'IRYASA', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.79 x 0.79 x 3.43 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} (Reviewed by my wife): I love the roller applicator of this under eye treatment. It makes applying the product very easy and helps avoid wasting product. The eye treatment smells great and goes on smooth. It moisturizes well and leaves a little shine, reducing the appearance of dark circles and lines. It is not a miracle product, however, and it does not get rid of really dark circles like the ones I have around my eyes. Love the roller applicator
profile:
The user continues to demonstrate a strong commitment to effective body care, focusing on exfoliation, hydration, and lip care to combat dryness. They prioritize products formulated for dry skin, particularly those with organic and certified ingredients. Recently, they have shown flexibility in hair care preferences, valuing both functionality and pleasant sensory experiences, with an emphasis on enjoyable scents.

Their latest addition highlights an ongoing interest in moisturizing treatments with unique textures, particularly preferring gentle cleansers that enhance skin softness and hydration without traditional foaming. This sophistication extends to their proactive approach to hand care, as evidenced by a comprehensive hand care set targeting dry and cracked hands, reflecting their vigilance in product quality and efficacy.

In light of their recent interaction regarding an eye treatment product, the user appears to appreciate practical application methods, such as roller applicators, that enhance usability and reduce product waste. They remain attentive to ingredients, functionality, and sensory experience in their beauty routine. Overall, their evolving preferences highlight a dedication to natural ingredients and effective solutions that cater to their specific skincare and hair care needs while enhancing comfort and enjoyment in their self-care practices.
